mn133:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati tapodārāme.
mn133:1.3: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya yena tapodo tenupasaṅkami gattāni parisiñcituṃ.
mn133:1.4: Tapode gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsi gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
mn133:1.5: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ tapodaṃ obhāsetvā yenāyasmā samiddhi tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā āyasmantaṃ samiddhiṃ etadavoca:
mn133:2.2: “Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:2.3: Tvaṃ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā”ti?
mn133:2.4: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:2.5: Dhāresi pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
mn133:2.6: “Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:2.8: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu na dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:2.9: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:2.10: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:2.11: dhārehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:2.12: Atthasaṃhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako”ti.
mn133:3.1: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā samiddhi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn133:3.2: “Idhāhaṃ, bhante, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya yena tapodo tenupasaṅkamiṃ gattāni parisiñcituṃ.
mn133:3.3: Tapode gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsiṃ gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
mn133:3.4: Atha kho bhante, aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ tapodaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā maṃ etadavoca:
mn133:4.1: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ devataṃ etadavocaṃ:
mn133:4.2: ‘na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:4.3: Tvaṃ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā’ti?
mn133:4.4: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:4.5: Dhāresi pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
mn133:4.6: ‘Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:4.8: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:4.9: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:4.10: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:4.11: dhārehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:4.12: Atthasaṃhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako’ti.
mn133:4.15: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca desetū”ti.
mn133:4.16: “Tena hi, bhikkhu, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn133:4.17: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā samiddhi bhagavato paccassosi.
mn133:6.2: idaṃ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
mn133:7.1: Atha kho tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi:
mn133:7.2: “idaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:7.19: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyā”ti?
mn133:7.21: “ayaṃ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ;
mn133:7.22: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ.
mn133:7.23: Yannūna mayaṃ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyāmā”ti.
mn133:7.24: Atha kho te bhikkhū yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā mahākaccānena saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu.
mn133:7.25: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etadavocuṃ:
mn133:7.26: “idaṃ kho no, āvuso kaccāna, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:7.31: Tesaṃ no, āvuso kaccāna, amhākaṃ, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi—
mn133:7.32: idaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:8.1: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyāti?
mn133:8.2: Tesaṃ no, āvuso kaccāna, amhākaṃ etadahosi:
mn133:8.3: ‘ayaṃ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
mn133:8.4: Pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ.
mn133:8.5: Yannūna mayaṃ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyāmā’ti.
mn133:9.1: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva mūlaṃ atikkamma khandhaṃ sākhāpalāse sāraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ maññeyya;
mn133:9.2: evaṃsampadamidaṃ āyasmantānaṃ satthari sammukhībhūte taṃ bhagavantaṃ atisitvā amhe etamatthaṃ paṭipucchitabbaṃ maññatha.
mn133:9.3: So hāvuso, bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato.
mn133:9.4: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṃ bhagavantaṃyeva etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha, yathā vo bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṃ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
mn133:10.1: “Addhāvuso kaccāna, bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato.
mn133:10.2: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṃ bhagavantaṃyeva etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyāma;
mn133:10.3: yathā no bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṃ dhāreyyāma.
mn133:10.4: Api cāyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ;
mn133:10.5: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ.
mn133:11.1: “Tena hāvuso, suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn133:11.2: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa paccassosuṃ.
mn133:12.1: “Yaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:12.6: Imassa kho ahaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi—
mn133:13.2: Iti me cakkhu ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti rūpāti—
mn133:13.3: tattha chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto atītaṃ anvāgameti.
mn133:13.4: Iti me sotaṃ ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti saddāti …pe…
mn133:13.5: iti me ghānaṃ ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti gandhāti …
mn133:13.6: iti me jivhā ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti rasāti …
mn133:13.7: iti me kāyo ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:13.8: iti me mano ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti dhammāti—
mn133:13.9: tattha chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto atītaṃ anvāgameti—
mn133:14.2: Iti me cakkhu ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti rūpāti—
mn133:14.3: tattha na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto atītaṃ nānvāgameti.
mn133:14.4: Iti me sotaṃ ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti saddāti …pe…
mn133:14.5: iti me ghānaṃ ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti gandhāti …
mn133:14.6: iti me jivhā ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti rasāti …
mn133:14.7: iti me kāyo ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:14.8: iti me mano ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti dhammāti—
mn133:14.9: tattha na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa, na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto atītaṃ nānvāgameti—
mn133:15.2: Iti me cakkhu siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti rūpāti—
mn133:15.3: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ paṇidahati, cetaso paṇidhānapaccayā tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto anāgataṃ paṭikaṅkhati.
mn133:15.4: Iti me sotaṃ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti saddāti …pe…
mn133:15.5: iti me ghānaṃ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti gandhāti …
mn133:15.6: iti me jivhā siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti rasāti …
mn133:15.7: iti me kāyo siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:15.8: iti me mano siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti dhammāti—
mn133:15.9: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ paṇidahati, cetaso paṇidhānapaccayā tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto anāgataṃ paṭikaṅkhati—
mn133:16.2: Iti me cakkhu siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti rūpāti—
mn133:16.3: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ nappaṇidahati, cetaso appaṇidhānapaccayā na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto anāgataṃ nappaṭikaṅkhati.
mn133:16.4: Iti me sotaṃ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti saddāti …pe…
mn133:16.5: iti me ghānaṃ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti gandhāti …
mn133:16.6: iti me jivhā siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti rasāti …
mn133:16.7: iti me kāyo siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:16.8: iti me mano siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti dhammāti—
mn133:16.9: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ nappaṇidahati, cetaso appaṇidhānapaccayā na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto anāgataṃ nappaṭikaṅkhati—
mn133:17.4: Tasmiñce paccuppanne chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati.
mn133:17.7: yā cāvuso, jivhā ye ca rasā …
mn133:17.8: yo cāvuso, kāyo ye ca phoṭṭhabbā …
mn133:17.9: yo cāvuso, mano ye ca dhammā—
mn133:17.11: Tasmiñce paccuppanne chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati—
mn133:17.12: evaṃ kho, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati.
mn133:18.1: Kathañca, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṃhīrati?
mn133:18.4: Tasmiñce paccuppanne na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṃhīrati.
mn133:18.7: yā cāvuso, jivhā ye ca rasā …
mn133:18.8: yo cāvuso, kāyo ye ca phoṭṭhabbā …
mn133:18.9: yo cāvuso, mano ye ca dhammā—
mn133:18.11: Tasmiñce paccuppanne na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṃhīrati—
mn133:18.12: evaṃ kho, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṃhīrati.
mn133:19.1: Yaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:19.6: Imassa kho ahaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi.
mn133:19.7: Ākaṅkhamānā ca pana tumhe āyasmanto bhagavantaṃyeva upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha,
mn133:19.8: yathā vo bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṃ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
mn133:20.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
mn133:20.2: “yaṃ kho no, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:20.7: Tesaṃ no, bhante, amhākaṃ, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi:
mn133:20.8: ‘idaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:20.25: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyā’ti?
mn133:20.27: ‘ayaṃ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
mn133:20.28: Pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ.
mn133:20.29: Yannūna mayaṃ yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkameyyāma; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyāmā’ti.
mn133:20.30: Atha kho mayaṃ, bhante, yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamimha; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etamatthaṃ paṭipucchimha.
mn133:20.31: Tesaṃ no, bhante, āyasmatā mahākaccānena imehi ākārehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi attho vibhatto”ti.
mn133:21.2: Mañcepi tumhe, bhikkhave, etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha, ahampi taṃ evamevaṃ byākareyyaṃ yathā taṃ mahākaccānena byākataṃ.
mn133:21.3: Eso cevetassa attho. Evañca naṃ dhārethā”ti.
mn133:21.5: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
